original_text:
Who provides food for the raven
    when its young cry out to God
    and wander about for lack of food?
korean_text: 까마귀 새끼가 하나님을 향하여 부르짖으며 먹을 것이 없어서 허우적거릴 때에 그것을 위하여 먹이를 마련하는 이가 누구냐

sentences.original_text: Who provides food for the raven
when its young cry out to God
and wander about for lack of food?
